pages.text: Follow this route on the Path of Lethality if you want to specialize in blade combat while leveling your spells up to their maximum potential. Slashing Augments have a big boost, and damage increased by Dangerous. You spells level up two times faster. Less effective at casting non-Fury spells however.

pages.mods: Dangerous/Pact of Danger, Blade Aspect, Furious
